patthana16.15:4.1: Kusalaṃ sārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.15:4.2: Kusalaṃ sārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.15:4.3: Kusalaṃ sārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasārammaṇo ca naakusalo nasārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.15:5.1: Akusalaṃ sārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.15:5.2: Akusalaṃ sārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.15:5.3: Akusalaṃ sārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasārammaṇo ca naakusalo nasārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.15:6.1: Abyākataṃ sārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.15:7.1: Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … aññamaññe tīṇi … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana16.15:8.1: Abyākataṃ anārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naanārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.15:8.2: Abyākataṃ anārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo naanārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.15:8.3: Abyākataṃ anārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naanārammaṇo ca naakusalo naanārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
